comments.html: Copy-paste error (the source code on GitHub is correct). Fixed. Thanks a million for pointing this out!
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Really an excellent series. I'm very curious how that series will continue. Keep up the good work. What I don't understand is why do you have an if statement for 'Vlan' in the BGP configuration template (stub interfaces) in one case but not in the other?
comments.name: Anonymous
